channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Payment Gateway Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Payment Gateway Services

item.title: CVE-2017-10069|2024-10-04T19:07:51.907Z -- oracle%20corporation -- payment%20gateway%20services
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Payment Interface component of Oracle Hospitality Applications (subcomponent: Core). The supported version that is affected is 6.1.1. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Payment Interface. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Payment Interface accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
